bike_01.title: Neon Cyber Bike
bike_01.text: A detailed 3D render of a futuristic motorcycle with glowing neon green highlights. The bike is parked in a dark, rainy alleyway with cinematic lighting and 8k reflections.

car_01.title: Retro Supercar
car_01.text: Low-poly 3D sports car in a synthwave setting. Purple and orange sunset background with palm trees. Chrome finish on the car body.
